common_errors.cause: Unable to connect to Boundary controller
common_errors.solution: Check BOUNDARY_ADDR is set correctly, verify controller is running, check network/firewall
Verify credentials, check auth method configuration, ensure user account exists

common_errors.cause: User lacks required permissions for the operation
common_errors.solution: Check user's role assignments and grants, verify scope permissions

common_errors.cause: Error creating or using a Boundary session
common_errors.solution: Check target and host configuration, verify worker is running, review session limits

common_errors.cause: Unable to establish connection through Boundary worker
common_errors.solution: Verify worker is running and connected to controller, check worker network access to target

common_errors.cause: Specified target does not exist or user lacks access
common_errors.solution: Check target ID/name, verify target exists in the scope, confirm user has target permissions

common_errors.cause: Error with host catalog (static or dynamic)
common_errors.solution: Verify host catalog configuration, check plugin credentials for dynamic catalogs
Check credential store configuration, verify Vault integration, review credential library settings
Check PostgreSQL connection, verify database credentials, ensure database migrations are current
Verify scope ID exists, check scope hierarchy (global -> org -> project), confirm access
